Name: vsock
Description: Package vsock provides access to Linux VM sockets (AF_VSOCK) for communication between a hypervisor and its virtual machines.  MIT Licensed.

Name: raw
Description: Package raw enables reading and writing data at the device driver level for a network interface.  MIT Licensed.

Name: mdlayher.com
Description: Matt Layher's personal static website. MIT Licensed.

Name: kobject
Description: Package kobject provides access to Linux kobject userspace events. MIT Licensed.

Name: hdhomerun_exporter
Description: Command hdhomerun_exporter implements a Prometheus exporter for SiliconDust HDHomeRun devices. MIT Licensed.

Name: hdhomerun
Description: Package hdhomerun enables interacting with SiliconDust HDHomeRun devices. MIT Licensed.

Name: homelab
Description: Configuration management for Matt Layher's machines. MIT Licensed.

Name: apcupsd_exporter
Description: Prometheus exporter that exposes metrics from apcupsd's NIS. MIT Licensed.

Name: apcupsd
Description: Package apcupsd provides a client for the apcupsd Network Information Server (NIS).  MIT Licensed.

Name: taskstats
Description: Package taskstats provides access to Linux's taskstats interface, for sending per-task and per-process statistics from the kernel to userspace.  MIT Licensed.
